title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.7 - Permission required to carry on commercial or other activity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.7 - Permission required to carry on commercial or other activity

State Regulations

No person shall carry on any commercial or other
activity at a truck terminal without the consent of the Port Authority, which
consent may be granted by lease, permit or otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
